sense.def:
A recovery
je izboljšanje počutja po bolezni ali operaciji.

seg.quote: He made a good recovery from his stroke.
The shock of the operation delayed his recovery.

sense.def:
A recovery
je tudi izboljšanje slabih gospodarskih razmer v državi.

seg.quote: His advisers insisted that economic recovery was in sight.
...last minute recoveries despite two decades of steady decline.

sense.def:
The recovery of something
pomeni tisto, kar je bilo izgubljeno ali ukradeno, dobiti nazaj;

The recovery of one's physical or mental state
pomeni, da je nekdo spet v boljšem telesnem ali duševnem stanju;

seg.quote: The news was sufficient to bring about the recovery of his equanimity.
